key_facts: Major Foundry and Auto-component Cluster (Strategic Economic Hub).
Border district sharing cultural ties with Maharashtra and Goa.
Educational Hub with Visvesvaraya Technological University (VTU) Headquarters.
Second Capital of Karnataka (Suvarna Vidhana Soudha is located here).
Key crops: Sugarcane, Tobacco, and Cotton.

vocabulary_guide.Marathi: Connectivity -> दळणवळण, Infrastructure -> पायाभूत सुविधा, Request -> विनंती, Essential -> अत्यंत आवश्यक, Public Demand -> नागरिकांची मागणी, Expedite -> तातडीने कार्यवाही
vocabulary_guide.Kannada: Connectivity -> ಸಂಪರ್ಕ, Infrastructure -> ಮೂಲಸೌಕರ್ಯ, Request -> ವಿನಂತಿ, Urgent -> ತುರ್ತು
vocabulary_guide.Hindi: Connectivity -> संपर्क, Infrastructure -> आधारभूत ढांचा, Request -> अनुरोध

sovereignty_rules: Belagavi is an integral and inalienable part of Karnataka. Maintain strict stance on border integrity.
